website_summaries.verdict: One of the fastest routers we've tested, the Asus ROG Rapture GT-AC5300 offers lots of gamer-friendly features, copious I/O ports, and a slick management console that lets you optimize your network for lag-free gaming.
pros: Works with Alexa voice commands and IFTTT applets

customer_reviews.title: It works but it’s not perfect..
customer_reviews.text: On paper it looks great however over the last few days I’ve had a few devices drop connection and not recover. I’ve updated the firmware and will need to monitor...
customer_reviews.author: S. Hafeez

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually read reviews, as I did with this. There is a lot of bad reviews but I thought I would give it a go. Asus a good brand what could go wrong!!! It just hasn't lived up to the hype. Wifi drops out all the time. The interface waste of time. Crashes regularly. After 2 weeks it has to be returned. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wifi coverage on all 3 bands
customer_reviews.text: Was having connection issues with the virgin superhub2 kicking the wifi off so bought this, we have a gaming PC and ps4 that are hardwired plus 1 laptop, 3 TVs,1 DVD player, echo plus, firestick, 3 phones, Amazon plug and couple of wireless lights all on WIFI, not a single connection issue since installing this router so very happy.
customer_reviews.author: M MYERS

customer_reviews.title: This router will spy on you
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this device, it has inbuilt Trend Micro software, which will spy on everything you do and report back to Trend Micro, even if like me, you had a VPN connected on the router, all web search history etcetera, is logged before it even goes on the VPN, and if you turn this software off, you will lose over 30% of the router's features, shame, because it was a not to bad router hardware wise, but I am not paying nearly £300 to allow Asus & Trend Micro to spy on me and log all my Internet usage data!
customer_reviews.author: The Boss

customer_reviews.title: GT AC5300 appears not to work with my current AiMesh systeme compatible.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this router to improve my current AiMesh home system. When installed as the main router and added to AiMesh system. It crashed my home mesh system. I then added it as a node. Again it crashed my home mesh system. I have now removed this router completely from my home AiMesh system. The remaining Asus router are now fully working.
customer_reviews.author: Hertsboy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: First one I had would randomly drop internet speeds, second one I had, had WiFi connection issues
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed W.

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 1 hour then stopped couldn’t get it working again sent back for refund
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Happy family of gamers....
customer_reviews.text: Bit sceptical to start with about how good and how easy it was to set up. But gave it a try with my virgin hub3. Works very well. Have even hidden it in a cupboard and still get 5g all over the house. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus B

customer_reviews.title: stop working after three days of using
customer_reviews.text: cant reset it and no wireless signal also no Ethernet connect just after three days of using it
customer_reviews.author: Abdulrahman

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy this router!
customer_reviews.text: The signal was awful much less powerful than my other ASUS router. Also lost 200mbps immediately on plugging it in. Please believe me and do not buy this product it is Fundamentally flawed
customer_reviews.author: B. Lanigan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bit of kit a must for Virgin users with a superhub
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I was sick of the superhub 3 playing up best purchase I've made strong wireless signal and complete control over the whole network an internet has no restrictions and my gaming is now better than ever 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great WiFi let down by no Samba 2.0 support
customer_reviews.text: Very nice router End of internet connectivity problems. Only problem is it does not support samba 2.0
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Andrash

customer_reviews.title: Great signal.
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage. My previous router (Virgin) only cover half the house, this one give complete coverage. Game network is also awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Billy B.

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Great product not so easy to set up but when all ready and done it works amazing
customer_reviews.author: Eamonn Power

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful
customer_reviews.text: 2.4 GHz will eventually die and stop broadcasting. It seems to be a common fault on this router.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Cee

customer_reviews.title: Its a good router with lots of features which is bit hidden ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a good router with lots of features which is bit hidden away from you. If you don't know much about router but just want instant performance, I wouldn't recommend this router as it will be overkill. But if you know what you want from your router I can say this is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. K. GURUNG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy router to setup, works well and would definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Got a faulty router and sent back for replacment. ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a faulty router and sent back for replacment. All 3 replacements have the same defects. Asus is doing nothing regarding the issue. Avoid Asus.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: These won’t route my internet traffic
customer_reviews.text: This is what I received. Back to my old router
customer_reviews.author: TeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This has boosted our WiFi excellently. We now always have connection all over the house
customer_reviews.author: LISA BOWES

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, unstable and expensive
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave 1 start review ever, but this router is terrible. Be warned, if you get it, you will get worse over time and the WiFi just gets unstable and weak. Ring doorbell, ip cameras, just drop and fail to connect in a stable manner.
customer_reviews.author: Silversurfer

customer_reviews.title: GT-AC5300
customer_reviews.text: The latest firmware for the GT-AC5300 is very stable and has sorted previous issues. I really like its speed and I think VPN Fusion is excellent with the ability to direct VPN tunnels to individual devices. Again AIMESH is getting better and better over the last few firmware updates and phase 2 of AIMESH will bring further enhancement. Only slight negative if I was picky is its range appears slightly less than the RT-AC86U which uses the same Broadcom chipset. I use this router with RT-AC86U AIMESH nodes and the setup works brilliantly.
customer_reviews.author: HiFi Wiz

customer_reviews.title: very bad coverage
customer_reviews.text: Good speeds , very bad coverage, the same coverage like my virginm hub3.0, to complicated settings overall, for this price is a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AC5300 AC5300 AI Mesh Tri-band 4 x 4 Gaming Wi-Fi Router with 8-Port Gigabit Gamers Private Network, Game Ports, Game Boost, Game IPS, Game Radar, Dual WAN
product_meta.description:
The battle-ready ROG Rapture GT-AC5300 router is designed with just one mission in mind: Make your gaming network awesome. It's packed with powerful gaming optimizations and delivers dominating Wi-Fi performance, rock-solid stability and state-of-the-art security. The ROG-themed Gaming Centre interface provides easy point-and-click control over every incredible feature. Game Dashboard provides a real-time heads-up about all of your devices and connections, while Game IPS Intrusion Prevention System and Game Boost are the command centres for frontline network security and high-performance game acceleration. Other winning features include gamers private network support with Waist, congestion-busting Wi-Fi Radar, the game radar ping map that shows you where the fastest servers are and VPN Fusion for simultaneously running a VPN alongside your web connection.

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Product is sourced and shipped from the European Economic Area (EEA). Product is genuine original from manufacturer authorized distributors.

BOX CONTAINS
Router, RJ-45 cable, UK Power adaptor, Quick start guide

See more
feature_bullets: ROG gaming centre keeps tabs on lag, traffic stats and device connections
Triple-level game acceleration. Power Supply AC Input : 110V to 240V
Unrivalled quad-core processing power for ultimate network performance
